summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1746, for the improvement of Yesler Way, in the City of Seattle, from the alley between Third Avenue and Fourth Avenue to the west margin of Broadway, by planking the same, under Ordinance No. 18478, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
